attributes.action: The UK to extend help during the flood in Kerala, the southern state of India.
attributes.additional_details:
Contribute generously to the Chief Minister's Distress Relief Fund. 
https://donation.cmdrf.kerala.gov.in/
attributes.background:
Heavy rain, massive floods and disastrous land sliding all through the state of Kerala, India. Many lost their lives, their house, many isolated in the critical area and many other resources vanished away.
This petition is to ask support from The UK government to support Kerala.
